name: Multiplayer Cars Battle Wars
description:
Make Them Fall : Multiplayer Car Battle is a futuristic car battle packed action game

Your task is to stay on the roof as much as possible and to push other players of the roof and make them fall from the ground. Pick up rockets and bullets from the ground and pump up your actions.

Team up with your friends and compete with the players online.

Unique Features :-
** Cross platform multiplayer
** 5 Unique monster cars to maximize your battle experience
** Create private rooms for personal challenges and public rooms to battle with other players
** Unique features like kick players from the room or make someone a host
** Live chat in lobby and in gameplay
** Simple and user friendly user interface

So team up with the best players around the globe and DOMINATE the battle ground.
